attributes.action: Stop dumping of nuclear waste in the ground/off shore off Cymru
attributes.additional_details: Cymru did not want nuclear nor does it want the waste from nuclear. An alternative answer must be found. In the meantime nuclear power stations should be closed and mothballed until science has caught up in its safe usage.
attributes.background: The Welsh Office/UK gov has failed in its duty to first consult MPs, AMs and more importantly the people of Cymru. Instead they have been 'consulting' behind closed doors. Transparency is needed not intrigue and a deadly legacy left for others.
